title: QA/QC Lead Job at Maventeq Systems Limited
content:
Maventeq Systems Limited - Our client, an Oil and Gas company in Nigeria is currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position(s): QA/QC Lead (Lagos)

Job Location: Lagos

The ideal candidate shall be responsible for the development, implementation, and oversight of the project's Quality Management System (QMS), ensuring all activities and deliverables comply with specifications, standards, and regulatory requirements.

 Responsibilities
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Development of the Project Quality Management Plan (PQMP) aligned with ISO 9001 requirements
	Ensure that all project specifications and standards incorporate required quality parameters from the
	outset.
	Ensure the quality of all materials and equipment acquired, including oversight of vendor inspections
	and quality documentation.
	Establish and monitor quality control points for fabrication and manufacturing processes.
	Define quality control procedures for materials, welding, and construction
	Conduct ongoing quality audits and inspections throughout the construction and installation activities.
	Manage non-conformities, implementing corrective actions, and preventive actions to maintain quality
	standards.
	Oversee implementation of quality control procedures at site and monitor welding procedures and nondestructive testing (NDT) activities.
	Manage quality documentation and records generated during these phases.


Job Requirements


	13+ years of QA/QC experience in oil/gas with 5+ years in pipeline construction projects
	CSWIP 3.1/3.2 or AWS-CWI (mandatory)
	ASNT Level II in minimum 2 NDT methods
	ISO 9001 Lead Auditor
	COREN registration (preferred)
	Minimum 3 major pipeline projects
	Nigerian content compliance experience
	Pipeline welding inspection (API 1104/ASME IX) & Non-destructive testing (RT/UT/MPI/DPI) supervision
	Quality management systems (ISO 9001:2015)
	Material certification verification & Construction quality surveillance
	Fluency in English (written and spoken)


Method of Application

Candidates should send their CV to: careers@maventeqsystems.com
